verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Are you hurting and broken within Overwhelmed by the weight of your sin Jesus is calling Have you come to the end of yourself Do you thirst for a drink from the well Jesus is calling{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come to the altar The Father’s arms are open wide Forgiveness was bought with The precious blood of Jesus Christ{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Leave behind your regrets and mistakes Come today there’s no reason to wait Jesus is calling Bring your sorrows and trade them for joy From the ashes a new life is born Jesus is calling{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come to the altar The Father’s arms are open wide Forgiveness was bought with The precious blood of Jesus Christ X2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh what a Savior Isn’t he wonderful Sing alleluia, Christ is risen Bow down before him For he is Lord of all Sing alleluia, Christ is risen X2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O come to the altar The Father’s arms are open wide Forgiveness was bought with The precious blood of Jesus Christ X2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bear your cross as you wait for the crown Tell the world of the treasure you’ve found{/lang-eng}
